short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the 'Continue Generating' button on ChatGPT.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Continue ChatGPT is a tool designed to enhance the user experience during ChatGPT sessions by automatically clicking the 'Continue Generating' button whenever it appears. This feature ensures that conversations remain seamless and uninterrupted, allowing users to engage in longer and more fluid interactions without the need for manual intervention. By eliminating the need to constantly monitor the session for interruptions, Auto Continue ChatGPT streamlines the chatting process, making it more convenient and efficient for users who rely on continuous output from the AI.

Please consider donating!: https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/2CQPNKWTRZABY
